properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM NOTICE WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, USER_ID, COUNT, CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER ON (NOTICE_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE N.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO NOTICE( NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_WRITER ) VALUES( SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ? )
UPDATE NOTICE SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, USER_ID, CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER ON (NOTICE_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND N.STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE = ?, NOTICE_CONTENT =? WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?
UPDATE NOTICE SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?
INSERT INTO NOTICE_REPLY ( REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, REF_NNO, REPLY_WRITER ) VALUES ( SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ? )
SELECT REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, USER_ID FROM NOTICE_REPLY R JOIN MEMBER ON (REPLY_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND REF_NNO = ? ORDER BY REPLY_NO DESC
